results.title: Related Companies - Wikipedia
results.content: **Related Companies, L.P.** is an American real estate firm with headquarters in New York City, and with offices around the country including in West Palm Beach, Chicago, Boston, Los Angeles, San Francisco, as well as in London. The following month, Related broke ground on Willets Point, the largest New York City affordable housing project in 40 years. The company announced in July 2024 that Ross would be stepping down as chairman of Related Companies to focus on his other business ventures. "Related Companies launches data center unit to develop $45bn pipeline". "Stephen Ross stays Related Companies exec chair, Blau new CEO". "Related Companies and Wynn to Bid for New Casino in Midtown Manhattan".

results.content: Abridged Business Plan (Insurance Companies) ... provide a chart illustrating the group structure, including details of business carried out by related group

results.title: Our Businesses - Related Companies
results.content: Widely recognized as one of the most innovative and prolific developers in the U.S., Related is dedicated to the highest standards of all aspects of the real estate equation including site acquisition, entitlements and planning to architecture and design, construction management, marketing, leasing and sales. Our operating portfolio consists of a diversified mix of properties including 38 luxury rental buildings with over 18,800 apartments, nearly 38.5 million square feet of commercial space, over 9,000 luxury condominium residences and approximately 60,000 affordable and workforce housing units located throughout the United States. Related Construction combines industry expertise with vertical integration and a collaborative construction management process, working closely with companies within the Related family and with external construction managers to carry out impactful projects.

results.title: Healthcare startup Abridge tops $5 billion valuation
results.content: Healthcare firm Abridge, which uses artificial intelligence to build medical documents, has raised $300 million at a $5.3 billion valuation.

results.title: Related Companies | Global Real Estate Development
results.content: On October 30, Related California and Mercy Housing California celebrated two major milestones in the revitalization of Sunnydale HOPE SF: the grand opening of Amani and Nia—bringing 170 affordable homes and 25,000 square feet of community-serving space—and the groundbreaking of Cielo and Luca, which will add another 184 homes to the Sunnydale community. On July 25, Related Midwest, the Related Affordable Foundation and Related Affordable celebrated the opening of two new playspaces for children ages 3–5 at Marshall Field Garden Apartment Homes, a 628-unit affordable housing community in Chicago. Thank you to all the residents, local community members and Related employees who volunteered to help build the new playgrounds.

raw_content:
Related Companies - Wikipedia
**Related Companies, L.P.** is an American real estate firm with headquarters in New York City, and with offices around the country including in West Palm Beach, Chicago, Boston, Los Angeles, San Francisco, as well as in London. The following month, Related broke ground on Willets Point, the largest New York City affordable housing project in 40 years. The company announced in July 2024 that Ross would be stepping down as chairman of Related Companies to focus on his other business ventures. "Related Companies launches data center unit to develop $45bn pipeline". "Stephen Ross stays Related Companies exec chair, Blau new CEO". "Related Companies and Wynn to Bid for New Casino in Midtown Manhattan".

[PDF] Abridged Business Plan (Insurance Companies)
Abridged Business Plan (Insurance Companies) ... provide a chart illustrating the group structure, including details of business carried out by related group

Our Businesses - Related Companies
Widely recognized as one of the most innovative and prolific developers in the U.S., Related is dedicated to the highest standards of all aspects of the real estate equation including site acquisition, entitlements and planning to architecture and design, construction management, marketing, leasing and sales. Our operating portfolio consists of a diversified mix of properties including 38 luxury rental buildings with over 18,800 apartments, nearly 38.5 million square feet of commercial space, over 9,000 luxury condominium residences and approximately 60,000 affordable and workforce housing units located throughout the United States. Related Construction combines industry expertise with vertical integration and a collaborative construction management process, working closely with companies within the Related family and with external construction managers to carry out impactful projects.

Healthcare startup Abridge tops $5 billion valuation
Healthcare firm Abridge, which uses artificial intelligence to build medical documents, has raised $300 million at a $5.3 billion valuation.

Related Companies | Global Real Estate Development
On October 30, Related California and Mercy Housing California celebrated two major milestones in the revitalization of Sunnydale HOPE SF: the grand opening of Amani and Nia—bringing 170 affordable homes and 25,000 square feet of community-serving space—and the groundbreaking of Cielo and Luca, which will add another 184 homes to the Sunnydale community. On July 25, Related Midwest, the Related Affordable Foundation and Related Affordable celebrated the opening of two new playspaces for children ages 3–5 at Marshall Field Garden Apartment Homes, a 628-unit affordable housing community in Chicago. Thank you to all the residents, local community members and Related employees who volunteered to help build the new playgrounds.
